item.title: Testing Dynamics 365 Finance Database Movement API with Postman
item.author: maxnguyen
item.description: Microsoft provides a versioned set of capabilities that you can currently use to copy databases between environments, and to list and download database backups. what you can do with Database movement API so far: List database backups Create database refresh Create a database export Get operation activity status More supported actions will be added in later releases. The endpoint uses impersonation authentication base, please follow to register a new application by using the Azure portal
